name: Dry Dock
introduction: Make a splash â€” in and out of the water â€” at our ultra glamorous salon on board.
longDescription: Coif, tease, dye, or curl your way to the mermaid locks of your seafaring dreams. From blowouts and conditioning treatments to highlights and our brow bar, our services have you looking as good as you feel.
needToKnows: Cancellation policy: Spa treatments are only fully refundable if they are canceled at least 24 hours in prior to the start of the booked treatment.

treatments.name: Cosmic Blowout
treatments.description: Shield your hair from humidity and frizz (commonplace with any good vacation locale) with a protective protein treatment that lasts up to six weeks. Followed by a blowout, you’ll leave with sleek locks, stronger hair and just a little bit more oomph overall.
treatments.introduction: Frizz-free and fabulous in less than an hour using Keratin ComplexÂ®. Wild, but true.

treatments.name: Scarlet Night Blowout
treatments.description: Our signature treatment is perfect for any big night out...including the big night (ahem, Scarlet Night). With a scalp massage, a hair mask based on your personal needs and a specialty blowout, you just may be mistaken for the Goddess of the Sea herself.
treatments.introduction: This red-hot conditioning treatment and blowout will have you looking as amazing as you feel.

treatments.name: Breakthrough Blowouts
treatments.description: Our personalized blowouts and styling sessions allow you to decide exactly how you want to look. Using products from L'Oréal and Kérastase, you’ll get a wash, blowout and a phenomenal finish. You tell us what you want, and we bring it to life—the only tease is in your hair (if you want it, of course).
treatments.introduction: A personalized, highly customized, so-very-you, not-for-anyone-else, exactly-as-you-want-itâ€¦ blowout.

treatments.name: Goddess Instant Highlights
treatments.description:
Our express highlights service offers you face-framing highlights (or lowlights) in only 10 minutes. From helping you shape your face to enhancing your skin tone, it’s a quick way to brighten up your look and get quickly back to poolside lounging.

We're sorry, Sailor, but you aren't able to book this particular treatment in the app. Please go to the Dry Dock to book in person.

treatments.name: Ethereal Colorful Hair
treatments.description:
With more than 50 gorgeous shades to choose from like pastel pink, sky blue, sea green and Scarlet red — our temporary color lasts from 4-10 washes, so you can embrace the new you… until you’re ready for old you again.

treatments.name: Lunar Braid Bar
treatments.description:
Our braid bar offers beach-ready braids and the option to take it up a notch with a touch of glitter.

treatments.name: Celestial Cocktails
treatments.description:
Depending on your hair’s needs, our crew will work with you to select the perfect cocktail of treatments from Kérastase’s 20+ options. From dryness to split ends and anything in-between, your personal cocktail can tackle 2 concerns in just 2 minutes—with results lasting up to 2 weeks. Almost... 2 good to be true.

treatments.description:

treatments.description:
With our 2 brow service options (Deluxe or Express, depending on time and desired look), you’ll leave with shaped and tinted brows that rival Hollywood starlets.

treatments.name: Starry-eyed Lashes
treatments.description:
No matter your natural lash situation, with our 3 lash services offered, we’ve got something for everyone. Our 6-week-lasting LVL Lift, Express Extensions or Strip Lashes (which add curl, volume, length, or all three) are all eye-opening experiences (literally and figuratively), and are still low-maintenance enough to suit your vacation vibes.
